survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Onboarding Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about their experience with the digital onboarding process to identify areas for improvement and enhance future onboarding experiences.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the digital onboarding process did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied experiences.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the digital onboarding process did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face during the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face during the digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of accessing and completing digital onboarding tasks?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of accessing and completing digital onboarding tasks?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable insights.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital onboarding process?
